pages:
Use the Course Planner to arrange your schedule after you have decided on which courses you're taking this semester.

1. Click on the semester you want to plan on the top carousel. You can look back on past semesters!

1. Use the search bar to add classes
2. Click on the Add button
3. Filter by distribution area, grading, or course level using the filter button

1. Click on a grayed out section to confirm a time for that section
2. Click again to see all sections again

1. When you're done planning your semester, export your calendar â€“ to Google or to any other calendar that support .ics files!
2. For now, export calendar only works for courses with published section times
